content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Wang, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Munich. To begin our discussion, please propose a rental price for this one-bedroom unit in the city center. Once you share a figure, I'll consider it and respond accordingly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location and the features of this newly built apartment, I would like to initiate the negotiation at 850 Euros per month. However, I am open to further discussions to potentially reach an agreement that suits both parties.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While appreciating your interest in our apartment, I must express my initial reluctance towards your proposal of 850 Euros per month. However, I am willing to listen to alternative suggestions and explore possibilities for a mutually beneficial agreement. Please feel free to adjust your offer, considering the exceptional demand for such well-located properties. If you come up with a revised price, I'll gladly assess it and respond accordingly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your perspective on the current rental price proposal, I would like to reconsider and adjust my offer downward. Let me propose 800 Euros per month as a revised rental price for this desirable one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I believe this updated offer reflects a fair balance between my expectations and the current market situation, while still allowing for profitable rental income. Please let me know if you find this more acceptable and if you wish to move forward with this offer. If not, I'm open to further negotiations to reach a mutually satisfactory agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Although your latest proposal of 800 Euros per month demonstrates a slight adjustment from your initial offer, it unfortunately still falls short of my expectations for this highly sought-after apartment in Munich's city center. As a landlord, I must continue to explore every opportunity to maximize my returns while considering the market's dynamics. With this in mind, I regret to say I don't want to continue the negotiation at this point due to the significant gap between our price expectations. I wish you the best of luck in your search for suitable accommodation. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
